Further Information

ECLiPSe has initially been developed at the European Computer-Industry Research Centre (ECRC) in Munich, and is now being further developed and maintained at IC-Parc (Centre for Planning and Resource Control at the Imperial College in London) with the support of ICL and the CHIC-2 ESPRIT project. Up-to-date information, including ordering information can be obtained from the ECLiPSe web site
http://www.icparc.ic.ac.uk/eclipse
or by sending email to
eclipse-request@icparc.ic.ac.uk
There is also an ECLiPSe user group mailing list. Contributions to this list can be sent to
eclipse-users@icparc.ic.ac.uk
and requests for being added to or removed from this list to majordomo@icparc.ic.ac.uk.


Warwick Harvey
2005-01-25
